BR_text.BRsummary: Harvester GUI abruptly displays an old image.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 Harvester GUI abruptly displays an old image.
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 Launch Harvester GUI and connect a device.
 Start image acquisition.
 Keep watching the canvas. You'd see a skip on the displayed images.
 
 Expected behavior
 It should always display consecutive images.
